languages.text: "Мои приветствия, Ваша Светлость. Нет нужды представляться — я знаю наследников династии фон Валанциус в лицо. Мое имя Ханн из Дома Кассини, я навигатор этого судна и, как старший выживший офицер, принял командование над ним после бедствия".

traits.locale_text: "Мои приветствия, Ваше Благородие. Нет нужды представляться — я знаю наследников династии фон Валанциус в лицо. Мое имя Ханн из Дома Кассини, я навигатор этого судна и, как старший выживший офицер, принял командование над ним после бедствия".

languages.text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."
languages.original_text: "Мои приветствия, Ваша Светлость. Нет нужды представляться — я знаю наследников династии фон Валанциус в лицо. Мое имя Ханн из Дома Кассини, я навигатор этого судна и, как старший выживший офицер, принял командование над ним после бедствия".

traits.locale_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I took command after the incident."

"My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I took command after the incident."

"My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

"My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

"My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

"My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

languages.text: 「お会いできて光栄です、陛下。自己紹介は不要です。フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者は、一目見ればわかります。私はカッシーニ家のハン、この船の航宙士であり、生き残った上級士官として事件後に指揮を執りました」
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: 「お会いできて光栄です、陛下。自己紹介は不要です――フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者は、一目見ればわかります。私はカッシーニ家のハン、この船の航宙士であり、生き残った上級士官として事件後に指揮を執りました。」

languages.text: “向您致意，大人。您无需自我介绍，我一眼就认出您是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人。我是卡西尼家族的汉恩，这艘舰船的导航者。作为幸存下来的高阶军官，我在事故发生之后就接管了指挥权。”
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，大人。您无需自我介绍，我一眼就认出您是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人。我是卡西尼家族的汉恩，这艘舰船的导航者。作为幸存下来的高阶军官，我在事故发生之后就接管了指挥权。”

languages.text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No hace falta que se presente: reconozco a los herederos del linaje von Valancius de vista. Soy Hann, de la casa Cassini, Navegante de esta nave. Como oficial superviviente de mayor rango, asumí el mando tras el incidente».
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No hace falta que se presente: reconozco a los herederos del linaje von Valancius de vista. Soy Hann, de la casa Cassini, Navegante de esta nave. Como oficial superviviente de mayor rango, asumí el mando tras el incidente».

languages.text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Les présentations ne seront pas nécessaires, le profil des von Valancius est reconnaissable entre mille. Je suis Hann de la maison Cassini, navigateur de ce vaisseau. En tant qu'officier survivant le plus gradé, j'en ai pris le commandement après l'incident. »
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Les présentations ne seront pas nécessaires, le profil des von Valancius est reconnaissable entre mille. Je suis Hann de la maison Cassini, navigateur de ce vaisseau. En tant qu'officier survivant le plus gradé, j'en ai pris le commandement après l'incident. »

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Eine Vorstellung ist überflüssig – ich kenne die Erben der Linie von Valancius vom Sehen. Ich bin Hann aus dem Haus Cassini, der Navigator auf diesem Schiff, und habe als ranghöchster überlebender Offizier nach dem Vorfall das Kommando übernommen."
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Eine Vorstellung ist überflüssig – ich kenne die Erben der Linie von Valancius vom Sehen. Ich bin Hann aus dem Haus Cassini, der Navigator auf diesem Schiff, und habe als ranghöchster überlebender Offizier nach dem Vorfall das Kommando übernommen."

languages.text: "Selamlarımı sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendinizi tanıtmanıza gerek yok, von Valancius soyunun vârislerini nerede görsem tanırım. Ben Cassini Hanesi'nden Hann. Bu geminin Rotacısı ve hayatta kalmış en kıdemli subayıyım. Yaşanan olay sonrasında yetki bana devroldu."
languages.original_text: "My greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is no need for introductions — I know the heirs of the von Valancius line by sight. I am Hann of House Cassini, the Navigator on this vessel, and, as the senior surviving officer, I assumed command after the incident."

traits.locale_text: "Selamlarımı sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendinizi tanıtmanıza gerek yok, von Valancius soyunun varislerini nerede görsem tanırım. Ben Cassini Hanesi'nden Hann. Bu geminin Rotacı'sı ve hayatta kalmış en kıdemli subayıyım. Yaşanan olay sonrasında yetki bana geçti."
